messages.message: Hi Austria, good job fending off Italy's attack
messages.input: My response to AUSTRIA:'Hi Austria, good job fending off Italy's attack'.

messages.message: It seems Russia and Turkey have teamed up and, if nothing else, I wouldn't want them to just take over your territory and grow too powerful
messages.input: My response to AUSTRIA:'It seems Russia and Turkey have teamed up and, if nothing else, I wouldn't want them to just take over your territory and grow too powerful'.
